title: Can't redeem my Neo Pax Sivir skin I got from Pax West
body: When I received my swag bag from Pax West a couple weeks ago, I got a Neo pax {{champion:15}} skin code, and I've attempted to enter it in the League store several times to no avail (yes I'm typing it in right). If anyone could help me out and/or is aware of the problem any help would be appreciated. Thanks!

replies.body: That's no good! Lay that code down next to piece of paper with your Summoner Name and Region written on it and take a picture of them. Send that picture over to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to help out!
Sure thing! Sorry for the late response. Thanks a lot
